key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges related to product labeling and packaging
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party suppliers
Intense competition in the sparkling water market
Market saturation and shifting consumer preferences
controversies: Litigation regarding delays in transitioning to BPA-free can liners
environmental_issues: Transition to BPA-free can liners completed in 2020, but past delays raised concerns
social_issues: Allegations of delayed BPA-free transitions and internal disputes impacting employee morale
governance_issues: Lawsuits and internal disputes highlighting potential governance risks
